text: WPIR may refer to: * WPIR (FM), a radio station (89.9 FM) licensed to serve Culpeper, Virginia, United States * WPER (FM), a radio station (90.5 FM) licensed to serve Fredericksburg, Virginia, which held the call sign WPIR in 2018 * WJYJ, a radio station (88.1 FM) licensed to serve Hickory, North Carolina, United States, which held the call sign WPIR from 1997 to 2018
title: WPIR
